ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule to prevent the editing of the Application record by Helpline when the Application is in any status other than Draft or Needs information.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISCHANGED( Is_Locked_Helpline__c ) ), Is_Locked_Helpline__c , $Permission.Helpline_Application_Permission, !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to edit the application.
